verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when he fled) (from Saul, in the cave.) Be gracious <WH2603> to me, O God, <WH430> be gracious <WH2603> to me, For my soul <WH5315> takes <WH2620> refuge <WH2620> in Thee; And in the shadow <WH6738> of Thy wings <WH3671> I will take <WH2620> refuge, <WH2620> Until <WH5704> destruction <WH1942> passes <WH5674> by.
I will cry <WH7121> to God <WH430> Most <WH9411> High, <WH9411> To God <WH410> who accomplishes <WH1584> [all things] for me.

He will send <WH7971> from heaven <WH8064> and save <WH3467> me; He reproaches <WH2778> him who tramples <WH9575> upon me. Selah. <WH5542> God <WH430> will send <WH7971> forth His lovingkindness <WH2617> and His truth. <WH571>

My soul <WH5315> is among <WH8432> lions; <WH9225> I must lie <WH7901> among those who breathe <WH3857> forth <WH3857> fire, <WH3857> [Even] the sons <WH1121> of men, <WH120> whose teeth <WH8127> are spears <WH2595> and arrows, <WH2671> And their tongue <WH3956> a sharp <WH2299> sword. <WH2719>
Be exalted <WH7311> above <WH5921> the heavens, <WH8064> O God; <WH430> [Let] Thy glory <WH9202> [be] above <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>

They have prepared <WH3559> a net <WH7568> for my steps; <WH6471> My soul <WH5315> is bowed <WH3721> down; <WH3721> They dug <WH3738> a pit <WH7882> before <WH6440> me; They [themselves] have fallen <WH5307> into the midst <WH8432> of it. Selah. <WH5542>
My heart <WH3820> is steadfast, <WH3559> O God, <WH430> my heart <WH3820> is steadfast; <WH3559> I will sing, <WH7891> yes, I will sing <WH2167> praises! <WH2167>
Awake, <WH5782> my glory; <WH9202> Awake, <WH5782> harp <WH5035> and lyre, <WH3658> I will awaken <WH5782> the dawn! <WH7837>
I will give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thee, O Lord, <WH136> among the peoples; <WH5971> I will sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to Thee among the nations. <WH3816>
For Thy lovingkindness <WH2617> is great <WH1419> to the heavens, <WH8064> And Thy truth <WH571> to the clouds. <WH7834>
Be exalted <WH7311> above <WH5921> the heavens, <WH8064> O God; <WH430> [Let] Thy glory <WH9202> [be] above <WH5921> all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
